plot: An unassuming, middle-aged man who checks himself into a clinic afflicted with an unknown ailment finds himself at the mercy of the hospital staff who carry out their own mysterious agenda.
title: Seven Storeys
plot_es: An unassuming, middle-aged man who checks himself into a clinic afflicted with an unknown ailment finds himself at the mercy of the hospital staff who carry out their own mysterious agenda.
plot_en: An unassuming, middle-aged man who checks himself into a clinic afflicted with an unknown ailment finds himself at the mercy of the hospital staff who carry out their own mysterious agenda.
